entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023
